Text: you can not advance is 2.0 in apple trailers...why this is 2.22??

@sheesh10 That's because there are 3 different versions:
1) Evangelion 2.0 - Theater Version
2) Evangelion 2.02 - Polished DVD Version
3) Evangelion 2.22 - Final Blue-Ray Version

The first movie is the same (1.0; 1.01; 1.11)
Prosim ta titulky su v obraze alebo kontajnery?
